alert.note: Alert for Baldwin; Clarke; Escambia; Mobile; Monroe; Washington (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued November 30 at 3:58AM CST until November 30 at 5:00AM CST by NWS Mobile
info.description: The National Weather Service in Mobile has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southwestern Monroe County in south central Alabama... Northeastern Mobile County in southwestern Alabama... Northwestern Baldwin County in southwestern Alabama... Southeastern Washington County in southwestern Alabama... Southeastern Clarke County in southwestern Alabama... Northwestern Escambia County in south central Alabama... * Until 500 AM CST. * At 357 AM CST, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 6 miles west of Wagarville to 4 miles south of Deer Park, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Frisco City, McCullough, Wagarville, Uriah, Calvert, Excel, McIntosh, I65 And AL 21 and Poarch Creek Reservation. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 600 AM CST for south central and southwestern Alabama. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 600 AM CST for south central and southwestern Alabama.

area.areaDesc: Baldwin; Clarke; Escambia; Mobile; Monroe; Washington
